text: Vy yavlyayetes' luchshey iz obshchin, poyavivsheysya na blago chelovechestva, povelevaya sovershat' odobryayemoye, uderzhivaya ot predosuditel'nogo i veruya v Allakha. Yesli by lyudi Pisaniya uverovali, to eto bylo by luchshe dlya nikh. Sredi nikh yest' veruyushchiye, no bol'shinstvo iz nikh - nechestivtsy
